e: ￹`misa~`lafii~ `a~ `ma~`tayal~￺to work through the night￻趕夜工 (熬夜)
￹`Sa~`lafii~ `sa~`~ `cingra~ `a~ `mi~`nokay~.￺He traveled home in the middle of the night.￻他徹夜回家
￹`O~ `lafii~ `ko~ `saka~`tahira~ `nira~ `i~ `loma'~.￺He arrived home at midnight.￻他半夜抵達家
d.f: ￹￺the middle of the night * midnight￻午夜，深夜，子夜，半夜
